tweets.id: this is an id used to identify the tweet. You can use any alphanumeric text. It must be unique, and without any spaces
tweets.userId: id of the user the tweet is from
tweets.replyTo: id of the tweet this is a reply to. If the userId is 'death', this is a reply option for the player
tweets.requires: comma separated ids of tweets/player responses/other stuff that must be visible before this tweet can become visible
